    Fields in org.drinkless.tdlib declared as TdApi.UpgradedGiftColors
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    TdApi.UpgradedGiftColors
    TdApi.UpgradedGift.colors
    Colors that can be set for user's name, background of empty chat photo, replies to messages and link previews; may be null if none.
    TdApi.UpgradedGiftColors
    TdApi.Chat.upgradedGiftColors
    Color scheme based on an upgraded gift to be used for the chat instead of accentColorId and backgroundCustomEmojiId; may be null if none.
    TdApi.UpgradedGiftColors
    TdApi.UpdateChatAccentColors.upgradedGiftColors
    Color scheme based on an upgraded gift to be used for the chat instead of accentColorId and backgroundCustomEmojiId; may be null if none.
    TdApi.UpgradedGiftColors
    TdApi.User.upgradedGiftColors
    Color scheme based on an upgraded gift to be used for the user instead of accentColorId and backgroundCustomEmojiId; may be null if none.
